IPS.Introduction: India Princely State Coins include coins from Native States like Kutch State Coins, Travancore Coins, Coorg state Coins, Cochin State Coins, Nawanagar Coins, Porbandar Coins, Junagadh Coins, Cambay State Coin, Baroda Coin, Tonk State Coin, Dewas Junior, Dewas Senior Coin, Indore State coins, Kishangarh Coin, Bundi State Coins, Datia State Coin, Farrukhabad state, Alwar State, Nabha state, Mysore State, Silver coins, Copper coins, Gold Coins.

Coin.Title: 1 Paisa - Sayaji Rao III
Coin.Obverse:
"Sarkar" in Devangari (Curved), long hoof and scimitar all within beaded circle. "Shri Sayajirao.M. Gaekwad "Sena Khas Khel Shamsher Bahadur" outside circle
Lettering: श्री सयाजीराव.म.गायकवाड. सरकार सेना खास खेल शमशेर बहादुर
Coin.Reverse:
"Samvat Ek Paisa" in Devnagari, date below, all within beaded circle. Wreath surrounds
Lettering: संवत एक पैसा १९४२
Translation: One Paisa VS 1942

Coin.Title: 1 Paisa - Sayaji Rao III(Type 2)
Coin.Obverse:
"Sarkar" in Devangari (Curved), long hoof and scimitar all within beaded circle. "Shri Sayajirao.M. Gaekwad "Sena Khas Khel Shamsher Bahadur" outside circle
Lettering: श्री सयाजीराव.म.गायकवाड. सरकार सेना खास खेल शमशेर बहादुर
Coin.Reverse:
"Samvat Ek Paisa" in Devnagari, date below, all within beaded circle. Wreath surrounds
Lettering: संवत एक पैसा १९४८
Translation: One Paisa VS 1948

Coin.Title: 2 Paisa - Sayaji Rao III
Coin.Obverse:
"Sarkar" in Devangari (Curved), long hoof and scimitar all within beaded circle. "Shri Sayajirao.M. Gaekwad "Sena Khas Khel Shamsher Bahadur" outside circle
Lettering: श्री सयाजीराव.म.गायकवाड. सरकार सेना खास खेल शमशेर बहादुर
Coin.Reverse:
Within beaded circle, value and VS date in Devnagari, "Samvat dhon paise"
Lettering: संवत दोन पैसे १९४८
Translation: Samvat year 1948, two paise

Coin.Title: 1 Paisa - Victoria
Coin.Obverse: Lettering: VIC TORIA QUEEN
Coin.Reverse:
Inscription in Nagari with VS date
Lettering: बूँदी राम सिंग
Translation: Bundi Ram Singh

Coin.Title: ½ Pice - Victoria [Anand Rao Pawar III]
Coin.Obverse: Crowned Bust of Queen Victoria to Left
Coin.Reverse: Lettering: 1/2 Pice Dhar State India 1887

Coin.Title: 1 paisa Jayaji Rao
Coin.Obverse: Large Nagari ji with sa ma sa above
Coin.Reverse: Trident, Nagari legend above, VS date 1937 below

Coin.Title: ½ Pice - Madho Rao
Coin.Obverse:
Cobra above crossed spear and trident
Lettering: श्री.माधवराव.मा.सिदें अ.बाहादुर
Coin.Reverse: Lettering: गवालीयर १ - २ पैसा १९५३

Coin.Title: ¼ Anna - Madho Rao
Coin.Obverse:
Royal emblem of Gwalior; stylized cobra above crossed spear and trident, within a circle of beads Legend in Devanagari surrounds
Lettering: श्री. माधवराव मा . सिंदे आलीजा बाहादर
Translation: Shree Madhavrao Shinde Alija Bahadur
Coin.Reverse:
Legend in Devanagari "Gwalior Pav Aana samvat", within circle of beads Wreath surrounds & VS date below
Lettering: गवालीयर. पाव आणा संमत १९५३
Translation: Gwalior, 1/4 anna, VS year 1953

Coin.Title: ¼ Anna - Madho Rao
Coin.Obverse:
Bust of Madho Rao facing right
Lettering: श्री.माधवराव शिंदे आलीजाबहादुर गवालियार
Translation: Shri Madhavarao Shinde Alijabahadur Gwalior
Coin.Reverse:
Value, Coat of arms, Date below Legend In Devnagari: Pav Anna, Samat 1974
Lettering: पाव आना समत १९७०
Translation: Quarter Anna VS year 1970

Coin.Title: ¼ Anna - Jivaji Rao
Coin.Obverse:
Bust of Jivaji Rao facing left, legend in Devnagari surrounds
Lettering: श्री जीवाजीराव शिंदे आलिजाबहादर गवालियार
Translation: Shree Jivaji Rao Shinde Alijabahadur Gwalior
Coin.Reverse:
Coat of arms, value in Devnagari & Urdu, VS date below
Lettering: पाव आना ايک پيسه समत १९८६
Translation: Quarter anna VS 1986

Coin.Title: ¼ Anna - Jivaji Rao
Coin.Obverse:
Bust of Jivaji Rao left Legend in Devnagari surrounds
Lettering: श्री जीवाजीराव शिंदे आलिजाह बहादर गवालियार
Translation: Shri Jivaji Rao Shinde Alijah Bahadur Gwalior
Coin.Reverse:
Coat of arms Value in Devnagari 'Paav Aana', VS date below
Lettering: पाव आना समत १९९९
Translation: Quarter anna VS 1999

Coin.Title: ½ Anna - Jivaji Rao
Coin.Obverse:
Bust of Jivaji Rao left Legend in Devnagari surrounds
Lettering: श्री जीवाजीराव शिंदे आलिजाह बहादर गवालियार
Translation: Shri Jivaji Rao Shinde Alijah Bahadur Gwalior
Coin.Reverse:
Reverse Coat of Arms Lettering in Devnagari: Aadha Aana, VS date below
Lettering: आधा आना समत १९९९
Translation: Half Anna VS year 1999

Coin.Title: 1 Pai - Mir Mahbub Ali Khan
Coin.Obverse:
Tughra: 92, Asaf Jah Nizam Al-Mulk Bahadur, AH date below.
Lettering: ٩٢ ١٣٢٧
Translation: 92 is the numerical representation of the word 'Muhammad' Nizam Asaf Jah, (AH) 1327
Coin.Reverse:
Inside circle, legend in Urdu 'Yek Pai' Outside circle, legend in Urdu, '(RY) Julus Maimanat Manus Zarb Farkhanda Bunyad - Hyderabad '
Lettering: ۴۲
Translation: One pie, struck at Farkhanda bunyad, Hyderabad, in the (RY) 42nd year of tranquil prosperity

Coin.Title: 1 Pai - Mir Usman Ali Khan
Coin.Obverse:
Tughra: 92, Asaf Jah Nazim Al-Mulk Bahadur, AH date below.
Lettering: ٩٢ ١٣۴۳
Translation: 92 is the numerical representation of the word 'Muhammad' Nizam Asaf Jah, (AH) 1343
Coin.Reverse:
Inside circle, legend in Urdu 'Yek Pai' Outside circle, legend in Urdu, '(RY) Julus Maimanat Manus Zarb Farkhanda Bunyad - Hyderabad '
Lettering: ١۴
Translation: One pie, struck at Farkhanda bunyad, Hyderabad, in the (RY) 14th year of tranquil prosperity

Coin.Title: 2 Pai - Mir Mahbub Ali Khan
Coin.Obverse:
Tughra: 92, Asaf Jah Nizam Al-Mulk Bahadur, AH date below.
Lettering: ٩٢ ١٣٢٣
Translation: 92 is the numerical representation of the word 'Muhammad' Nizam Asaf Jah (AH) 1323
Coin.Reverse:
Inside circle, legend in Urdu 'Du Pai' Outside circle, legend in Urdu, '(RY) Julus Maimanat Manus Zarb Farkhanda Bunyad - Hyderabad '
Lettering: ۴۰
Translation: Two pies, struck at Farkhanda bunyad, Hyderabad, in the (RY) 40th year of tranquil prosperity

Coin.Title: 2 Pai - Mir Usman Ali Khan
Coin.Obverse:
Tughra: 92, Asaf Jah Nizam Al-Mulk Bahadur, AH date below.
Lettering: ٩٢ ١٣۴٨
Translation: 92 is the numerical representation of the word 'Muhammad' Nizam Asaf Jah, (AH) 1348
Coin.Reverse:
Inside circle, legend in Urdu 'Du Pai' Outside circle, legend in Urdu, '(RY) Julus Maimanat Manus Zarb Farkhanda Bunyad - Hyderabad '
Lettering: دو پای حیدرآباد
Translation: Two pies, struck at Farkhanda bunyad, Hyderabad, in the (RY) 19th year of tranquil prosperity

Coin.Title: 2 Pai - Mir Usman Ali Khan
Coin.Obverse:
Divided legend in Urdu '92, Asaf Jah Nizam Al-Mulk Bahadur', AH date, value 'Do Pai' below
Lettering: ٩٢ ١٣٦۵ حیدرآباد
Translation: 92 1365 Two Pie
Coin.Reverse:
Legend in Urdu, '(RY) Julus Maimanat Manus Zarb Farkhanda Bunyad - Hyderabad '
Lettering: ٣٦ بهادر دو پای
Translation: Struck at Farkhanda bunyad, Hyderabad, in the (RY) 36th year of tranquil prosperity

Coin.Title: ½ Anna - Mir Usman Ali Khan
Coin.Obverse:
Tughra: 92, Asaf Jah Nizam Al-Mulk Bahadur, AH date below.
Lettering: ٩٦ ١٣۴٨
Translation: 92 is the numerical representation of the word 'Muhammad' Nizam Asaf Jah, (AH) 1332
Coin.Reverse:
Inside circle, legend in Urdu 'Nim Anna' Outside circle, legend in Urdu, '(RY) Julus Maimanat Manus Zarb Farkhanda Bunyad - Hyderabad '
Lettering: نيم انة ۲ جلوس ميمنت مانوس ضرب فرخند بنباد حيدارباد
Translation: Half Anna, Struck at Farkhanda bunyad, Hyderabad, in the (RY) 2nd year of tranquil prosperity

Coin.Title: 1 Anna - Mir Usman Ali Khan
Coin.Obverse:
Tughra: 92, Asaf Jah Nizam Al-Mulk Bahadur, AH date below. Legend '1 Anna' in 4 languages, Devnagari, English, Kannada & Telugu
Lettering: ٩٢ ١۳۵۴ 1 ANNA
Translation: 92 is the numerical representation of the word 'Muhammad Nizam Asaf Jah, (AH) 1338 1 Anna
Coin.Reverse:
Denomination in center, flanked by legends in Urdu "Yek Anna"on the right, "Sikka Usmania" on the left
Lettering: ١ يك انه سكه عثمانيه
Translation: One Anna Coin of Osmania

Coin.Title: 1 Anna - Mir Usman Ali Khan
Coin.Obverse:
Tughra: 92, Asaf Jah Nizam Al-Mulk Bahadur 1 Anna in 3 languages on 3 corners AH date on bottom right corner
Lettering: 1 Anna ٩٢ ١٣۵٩
Translation: 1 Anna 92 is the numerical representation of the word 'Muhammad' Nizam Asaf Jah 1359
Coin.Reverse:
Denomination in the center. Legend in Urdu ' Sikka Usmania, Ek Anna' surrounds
Lettering: ١
Translation: One Anna, coin of Osmania

Coin.Title: 1 Anna - Mir Usman Ali Khan
Coin.Obverse:
Tughra: 92, Asaf Jah Nizam Al-Mulk Bahadur 1 Anna in 3 languages on 3 corners, AH date on bottom right corner
Lettering: ٩٢ 1 ANNA १ आणा ۱۳٦۲
Translation: 1 Anna 92 is the numerical representation of the word 'Muhammad' Nizam Asaf Jah 1362
Coin.Reverse:
Denomination in the center. Legend in Urdu ' Sikka Usmania, Ek Anna' surrounds
Lettering: ١
Translation: One Anna, coin of Osmania

Coin.Title: 2 Anna - Mir Usman Ali Khan
Coin.Obverse:
CharMinar (FourMinarets) gateway Legend in Urdu :92 Asaf Jah (top), Bahadur (left) Nizam Al-Mulk (right). 'Ain' (Urdu alphabet for "O", initial of "Osman" in the doorway). AH date below gateway
Lettering: ٩٢ ١٣٥١
Translation: 92 (numerical representation of the word 'Muhammad'), Asaf Jah, brave ruler of the realm (AH) 1351
Coin.Reverse:
Inside circle, legend in Urdu 'Do Aana' Outside circle, legend in Urdu:"22 Julus Maimanat Manus Zarb Farkhanda Bunyad - Hyderabad"
Lettering: ٢٢
Translation: Two Annas Struck at Farkhanda bunyad, Hyderabad, in the (RY) 22nd year of tranquil prosperity

Coin.Title: 2 Anna - Mir Usman Ali Khan
Coin.Obverse:
CharMinar (FourMinarets) gateway Legend in Urdu :92 Asaf Jah (top), bahadur (left) Nizam Al-Mulk (right). 'Ain' (Urdu alphabet for "O", initial of "Osman" in the doorway). AH date below gateway
Lettering: ٩٢ ١٣٦٢
Translation: 92 (numerical representation of the word 'Muhammad'), Asaf Jah, brave ruler of the realm (AH) 1362
Coin.Reverse:
Inside circle, value in numerals Outside circle, legend in Urdu:"33 Julus Maimanat Manus Zarb Farkhanda Bunyad - Hyderabad"
Lettering: ٢ ٣٣
Translation: 2 (annas) Struck at Farkhanda bunyad, Hyderabad, in the (RY) 33rd year of tranquil prosperity

Coin.Title: 4 Anna - Mir Usman Ali Khan
Coin.Obverse:
CharMinar (FourMinarets) gateway Legend in Urdu :92 Asaf Jah (top), bahadur (left) Nizam Al-Mulk (right). 'Ain' (Urdu alphabet for "O", initial of "Osman" in the doorway). AH date below gateway
Lettering: ٩٢ ۱۳٦٦
Translation: 92 (numerical representation of the word 'Muhammad'), Asaf Jah, brave ruler of the realm (AH) 1366
Coin.Reverse:
Inside circle, value in Urdu Outside circle, legend in Urdu:"37 Julus Maimanat Manus Zarb Farkhanda Bunyad - Hyderabad"
Lettering: ٣٧
Translation: Two annas Struck at Farkhanda bunyad, Hyderabad, in the (RY) 37th year of tranquil prosperity

Coin.Title: 8 Anna - Mir Usman Ali Khan
Coin.Obverse:
CharMinar (FourMinarets) gateway Legend in Urdu :92 Asaf Jah (top), bahadur (left) Nizam Al-Mulk (right). 'Ain' (Urdu alphabet for "O", initial of "Osman" in the doorway). AH date below gateway
Lettering: ٩٢ ۱۳٦٦
Translation: 92 (numerical representation of the word 'Muhammad'), Asaf Jah, brave ruler of the realm (AH) 1366
Coin.Reverse:
Inside circle, value in Urdu Outside circle, legend in Urdu:"37 Julus Maimanat Manus Zarb Farkhanda Bunyad - Hyderabad"
Lettering: ٣٧
Translation: Eight annas Struck at Farkhanda bunyad, Hyderabad, in the (RY) 37th year of tranquil prosperity

Coin.Title: 1 Rupee - Afzal-ad-Daula Hyderabad
Coin.Obverse:
A legend in Persian script, partly off flan, giving the ruler's name and title: Asaf Jah, Nizam al-Mulk; at bottom of flan the Hejira date in Hyderabad numerals, 1281
Lettering: ۱۲۸۲
Coin.Reverse: A legend in Persian script, partly off flan; with Regnal year 8 at top left

Coin.Title: 1 Rupee - Mir Usman Ali Khan
Coin.Obverse:
CharMinar (FourMinarets) gateway Legend in Urdu :92 Asaf Jah (top), bahadur (left) Nizam Al-Mulk (right). 'Ain' (Urdu alphabet for "O", initial of "Osman" in the doorway). AH date below gateway
Lettering: ٩٢ اصفجاہ بهَادُر نظامُ الملك ء ســـنہ١٣٣٧
Translation: 92 (numerical representation of the word 'Muhammad') Asaf Jah, brave ruler of the realm (AH) 1330
Coin.Reverse:
Inside circle, value in Urdu Outside circle, legend in Urdu:"8 Julus Maimanat Manus Zarb Farkhanda Bunyad - Hyderabad"
Lettering: يَك روپيّہ جُلوسِ مَيمِنت مَانوس ضَرِبَ فرخنده بُنَيَاد حَیدرآبَادُ
Translation: One Rupee Struck at Farkhanda bunyad, Hyderabad, in the (RY) 8th year of tranquil prosperity

Coin.Title: 1 Rupee - Mir Usman Ali Khan
Coin.Obverse:
CharMinar (FourMinarets) gateway Legend in Urdu: 92 Asaf Jah (top), bahadur (left) Nizam Al-Mulk (right). 'Ain' (Urdu alphabet for "O", initial of "Osman" in the doorway). AH date below gateway
Lettering: ٩٢ ١٣٦۲
Translation: 92 (numerical representation of the word 'Muhammad') Asaf Jah, brave ruler of the realm (AH) 1362
Coin.Reverse:
Inside circle, value in numerals Outside circle, legend in Urdu:"32 Julus Maimanat Manus Zarb Farkhanda Bunyad - Hyderabad"
Lettering: ١ ٣۴
Translation: 1 (rupee) Struck at Farkhanda bunyad, Hyderabad, in the (RY) 32nd year of tranquil prosperity

Coin.Title: Hyderabad Feudatory- Aurangabad, Copper Toka Cash
Coin.Obverse: Sword at right, small floral design upside down, Manus maimanat and mint name below, complete dated
Coin.Reverse: Persian legend

Coin.Title: Hyderabad Feudatory- Aurangabad, Toka cash
Coin.Obverse: Sword at right, small floral design upside down, Manus maimanat and mint name below, complete dated
Coin.Reverse: Persian legend

Coin.Title: Hyderabad Feudatory- Basmatnagar
Coin.Obverse: Palm (hand)
Coin.Reverse: Uniface, Elongated bar Type

Coin.Title: Hyderabad Feudatory- Basmatnagar
Coin.Obverse: Palm (hand)
Coin.Reverse: Uniface

Coin.Title: 1 Paisa - Asaf Jah IV / V
Coin.Obverse: Crude lion L, with tail raised.
Coin.Reverse: Mint name, in Persian

Coin.Title: ¼ Anna - Shivaji Rao
Coin.Obverse:
Bull reclining left Continuous with ruler's name and "Indore"
"Sivaji Raho"
Coin.Reverse: Date below denomination

Coin.Title: ½ Anna - Shivaji Rao
Coin.Obverse:
Bull reclining left, legend in Devnagari surrounds, 'Shreemant Maharaj Holkar Sarkar Indore'
Lettering: श्रीमंत माहाराज होलकर सरकार इंदोर
Translation: Majesty King Holkar Indore Government
Coin.Reverse:
Value in Devnagari: "Ardha Aana", VS date below within circle of beads, wreath surrounds
Lettering: अर्धा आणा . सं १९४३
Translation: Half Anna, Year VS 1943

Coin.Title: ½ Anna - Shivaji Rao(Type II)
Coin.Obverse:
Bull reclining left, legend in Devnagari surrounds, 'Shreemant Maharaj Holkar Sarkar Indore'
Lettering: श्रीमंत माहाराज होलकर सरकार इंदोर
Translation: Majesty King Holkar Indore Government
Coin.Reverse:
Value in Devnagari: "Ardha Aana", VS date below within circle of beads, wreath surrounds
Lettering: अर्धा आणा . सं १९४४
Translation: Half Anna, Year VS 1944

Coin.Title: 1 Tanka - Hussain Shah Jaunpur
Coin.Obverse:
Arabic inscription and AH Date
Lettering: ٨٨١
Translation: al-khalifa amir al-mu minin khulidat khilafatahu
Coin.Reverse:
Inscription
Translation: husain shah bin mahmud shah bin ibrahim shah sultan khulidat mamlakatahu

Coin.Title: 1 Takka - Takhat Singh AH1259-1290/ 1843-1873AD
Coin.Obverse: Lettering: Victoria

Coin.Title: ¼ Anna - George VI [Umaid Singh]
Coin.Obverse:
Ruler: Umaid Singh
Persian 6" below Daroga's mark - for George VI
Lettering: ٦
Coin.Reverse: Umaid Singh...

Coin.Title: 1 Dokdo - Desalji II
Coin.Obverse:
Lettering: राउ श्री देसलजी
Translation: Rao Shree Desalji
Coin.Reverse:
Lettering: ۱۲٥٩
Translation: AH 1259

Coin.Title: 1½ Dokda - George V [Khengarji III]
Coin.Obverse:
In center, vertical dagger, 'sanah' AD date below Outer margin, legend in Urdu 'George V, Kaiser Hind, zarb Bhuj'
Lettering: جورج ۵ ۱۶٢۹
Translation: George V, Emperor of India, struck at Bhuj Year 1929
Coin.Reverse:
In outer margin, lettering in Nagari: Maharao Shri Khengarji sawai Bahadur In center, trisul (trident), value 'Dod Dokdo' and VS date below
Lettering: महाराओ श्री खेंगारजी सवाइ बहादुर .कच्छ. दोढ दोकडो ૧૯८५
Translation: Maharao Shree Khengarji the brave .Kutch. 1 1/2 dokdos 1985

Coin.Title: 1 Dhabu - George VI [Vijayaraji]
Coin.Obverse:
In center around hole, wreath inside plain circle Outer margin, legend in Urdu ''George VI, Kaiser Hind, zarb Bhuj', AD date
Lettering: ۱۹۴٣
Translation: George VI, Emperor of India, struck in Bhuj, 1943
Coin.Reverse:
In center around hole, Crescent moon, trident and vertical dagger, value below Outer margin, legend in Devnagari, VS date
Lettering: महाराओ श्री विजयराजजी *कच्छ १૯૯૯* ढबु
Translation: Maharao Shri Vijayarajji *Kutch 1999* Dhabu

Coin.Title: 1 Kori - George V [Khengarji III]
Coin.Obverse:
Trident, crescent and dagger, VS date below all within circle Outer margin, legend in Devnagari
Lettering: महाराउ श्री खेंगारजी कच्छ भुज १૯८५
Translation: Maharao Shri Khengarji .Kutch Bhuj. 1985
Coin.Reverse:
Outer ring, legend in Persian "George V Kaiser Hind", zarb Bhuj, AD date Inside ring, value in Devnagari "Kori Ek"
Lettering: ١٩٢٨ कोरी अेक
Translation: George V Emperor of India, struck in Bhuj (AD)1927 One Kori

Coin.Title: 1 Kori - George VI [Khengarji III]
Coin.Obverse:
Trident, crescent and dagger, VS date below all within circle Outer margin, legend in Devnagari
Lettering: महाराउ श्री खेंगारजी कच्छ भुज १૯૯५
Translation: Maharao Shri Khengarji .Kutch Bhuj. 1995
Coin.Reverse:
Outer ring, legend in Persian "George VI Kaiser Hind", zarb Bhuj, AD date Inside circle, value in Devnagari "Kori Ek"
Lettering: ١٩٣٨
Translation: George VI Emperor of India, struck in Bhuj (AD)1938 One Kori

Coin.Title: 5 Kori - George V [Khengarji III]
Coin.Obverse:
Trident, crescent & dagger Within circle, legend in Devanagari:"Kori Paanch/Kutch Bhuj/VS date" Outside circle Rao's name in Devnagari 'Maharaja Dhiraj Mirza Maharau Shree Khengarji Sawai Bahadur'
Lettering: कोरी पांच कच्छ भुज १૯૯२ महाराजा धिराज मिरजा महाराउ श्री खेंगारजी सवाई बहादुर
Translation: Five koris, VS 1992 Maharaja Khengarji the brave
Coin.Reverse:
Legend in Urdu:"George V, Kaisar Hind, Zarb Bhuj, AD date"
Lettering: ١٩٣۴
Translation: George V, Emperor of India, struck at Bhuj, 1934

Coin.Title: 1 Anna - Bhupal Singh
Coin.Obverse:
Lettering in Nagari: Chitrakoot Udaipur
Lettering: चित्रकूट उदयपुर
Coin.Reverse:

Lettering: दोस्ति लंधन २०००

Coin.Title: 1 Paisa - Ranjit Singh
Coin.Obverse:
Star on top of central shield containing Hanuman (the Hindu monkey God)walking left, holing club in right hand and an object in left hand. Flower and plants outside shield. Three-fold ribbon at bottom with lettering in central part. Flat Border.
Lettering: रतलम
Coin.Reverse:
Central beaded circle contains lettering,"Ek paisa (one paisa), San (year)and 1947" in Nagri. Flowers and plants around outside of circle. Flat Border.
Lettering: एक पैसा संः १९४७
